data: "Introducing PREVENT-IA, the AI-powered education platform designed specifically for workers and managers in high-risk industries. This product addresses the need for accessible, personalized, and trackable occupational risk prevention training. With features like chat support, content annotation, and report generation, PREVENT-IA goes beyond traditional on-site training methods. Unlike competing products that focus on manual tracking and outdated information, PREVENT-IA offers real-time alerts, personalized recommendations, and dynamic content. Trust us to help you reduce accidents and improve safety in your workplace."
